DarkMouse::

She jumped back and fired at close range, aiming for his 
shoulder. "STAND DOWN NOW!"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Berserk:
> 
> 
> 
> Berserk leapt into the air, flipping, avoiding the blast as much as 
> he could. He leapt down on Apocolypse, smashing his feet on him 
with 
> his heavy weight.
> 
> He immediately jumped off, towards Dark Mouse. His claws brought 
> traction on his landing. He went to grab for her. 
> 
>
